responses.product_inquiry: We offer a variety of products including electronics, books, clothing, and more. How can I assist you further?

responses.shipping_info: We offer various shipping methods including standard, express, and next-day delivery. Shipping times depend on the method chosen and your location.

responses.payment_methods: We accept multiple payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Please choose the method that suits you best at checkout.
responses.support_contact: You can contact our support team via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567.
responses.business_hours: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM. We are closed on weekends and public holidays.
